means: 挖地道的兵，工兵( sapper的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: They requested sappers to mend bridges or remove mines.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们要求坑道工兵修桥或拆雷。

sentence.Network_en: We have special sappers well trained for that.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们有经过良好的专门训练的工程兵来对付它.

sentence.Network_en: British Sappers have their health individually increased by 5.
sentence.Network_cn: 英军工兵班每个班兵的生命由55增加为60.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语部队名称翻译... ... 高射炮部队 anti-aircraft artillery unit; 工兵部队 engineer troops;sappers; 后备部队 reserve unit.

list.abs: Orc sapper(兽人工兵) 介绍:比人类工兵皮厚,基本性能一样,但没有地雷技能。 需求:Melee 1、Teamwork 1 属性:弓箭 21、火器 -4、火焰 21、闪电 11、冰冻 -.

use your light and heavy infantry , direct and indirect fire units , engineer and sapper vehicles , plus ground attack fighters and logistical airborne re-supply transports with multiple team identities .使用你的轻型和重型步兵，直接和间接的消防单位，工程师和工兵车，加上地面攻击战机和后勤空降再补给与运输队
take control of the Green Beret , the spy , the sniper and the sapper .控制绿色贝雷帽，间谍，狙击手和工兵。
The commander sent in the sappers . Its time to send in the lawyers ., 指挥员派去工兵 . 是该去找律师的时候了.

entry.def: A sapper is a soldier whose job is to do building, digging, and similar work.

example.ex: They requested sappers to mend bridges or remove mines.
example.tran: 他们要求坑道工兵修桥或拆雷。

auth_sentence.content: He arrived full of energy, itching to join his fellow Sappers and was quickly in the thick of it in Sangin.

auth_sentence.content: You expect to find here the graves of drivers and sappers, troopers and stokers, havildars and sepoys.
